dublin_core.dcvalue: mCenas! Is an interactive two-way SMS system that is free and provides behavior change stories for youth, informational messaging about contraceptive methods and an interactive FAQ function where youth can ask a range of questions about reproductive health.

Rita Badiani, Country Representative, Pathfinder International, Email: rbadiani@pathfinder.org | Maria de Conceicao Rodriques, Clinical Outreach Specialist, USAID/Mozambique, Email: mrodrigues@usaid.gov
Client education and behavior change communication, Sexual and Reproductive Health
